text: Lieurey is a commune in the Eure department in Normandy in northern France. ==Population== ==International relations== ===Twin towns – sister cities=== The 14 communes of the former canton of Saint-Georges-du-Vièvre (Normandy, France), including Lieurey, are twinned with Slimbridge (Gloucestershire, England). ==See also== *Communes of the Eure department ==References== *INSEE Category:Communes of Eure
title: Lieurey
